majorWeaknesses: Placeholder: Буде заповнено після аналізу full proposal
Lack of commercialization track record (already identified)

criticalIssues.impact: Блокує подання заявки без consortium або spin-off
criticalIssues.recommendation: MUST resolve before submission - form consortium with SME partner

criticalIssues.impact: Weakens Excellence criterion, особливо Technical Innovation та Team Expertise
criticalIssues.recommendation: Demonstrate quick learning through pilot projects, consider adding LLM expert to team
Strong business partner in consortium, compelling market analysis, letters of support from potential customers

improvementRecommendations.currentGap: Placeholder: Needs specific LLM expertise demonstration
improvementRecommendations.recommendation: Include detailed technical plan showing: (1) specific LLM architecture chosen and why, (2) training strategy with clear milestones, (3) evaluation metrics, (4) pilot experiments demonstrating feasibility

improvementRecommendations.currentGap: Missing LLM expert in core team
improvementRecommendations.recommendation: Add advisor or team member with proven LLM experience (publications, products), or secure consultant from established AI company/lab

improvementRecommendations.currentGap: No customer validation or letters of support
improvementRecommendations.recommendation: Conduct 5-10 customer interviews, get 2-3 letters of intent from potential customers, include quotes/testimonials in proposal

improvementRecommendations.currentGap: Placeholder: TBD based on business case
improvementRecommendations.recommendation: Develop clear, realistic business model with: (1) well-researched pricing, (2) detailed customer acquisition strategy, (3) conservative but achievable revenue projections, (4) competitive analysis

improvementRecommendations.currentGap: Placeholder: TBD based on project plan
improvementRecommendations.recommendation: Identify 5-7 key risks (technical, market, team) with specific, credible mitigation strategies. Show contingency planning.

alternativeStrategy.recommendation: PREPARE for next call or alternative grants
alternativeStrategy.timeline: Use next 2-3 months to strengthen position
actions: Resolve SME status (consortium or spin-off) - Priority: CRITICAL
Build LLM practical experience (2-3 pilot projects) - Priority: CRITICAL
Develop strong business case with market validation - Priority: HIGH

actionItems.action: Conduct full self-evaluation with completed proposal

note:
ЦЕЙ ФАЙЛ є PLACEHOLDER для self-evaluation. Повноцінна самооцінка може бути проведена тільки після написання повного proposal draft. 

Однак вже зараз можна ідентифікувати критичні проблеми:
1. SME status - MUST resolve
2. Limited LLM experience - MUST strengthen
3. No commercial track record - MUST develop strong business case
4. Insufficient time for current call - RECOMMEND prepare for future

Для майбутніх application рекомендується:
1. Написати full proposal draft
2. Провести internal evaluation using this template
3. Score each criterion objectively
4. Identify weaknesses and improve
5. Get external review
6. Iterate until achieving estimated score 11+ (out of 15)
